30static void usb_can_draw_callback(Canvas* canvas, void* _model) {
31 UsbCanModel* model = (UsbCanModel*)_model;
32 char temp_str[18];
33
34 canvas_set_font(canvas, FontSecondary);
35 snprintf(temp_str, 18, "COM PORT:%u", model->vcp_port);
36 canvas_draw_str_aligned(canvas, 126, 8, AlignRight, AlignBottom, temp_str);
37
38 if(model->tx_cnt < 100000000) {
39 canvas_set_font(canvas, FontSecondary);
40 canvas_draw_str_aligned(canvas, 127, 24, AlignRight, AlignBottom, "B.");
41 canvas_set_font(canvas, FontKeyboard);
42 snprintf(temp_str, 18, "%lu", model->tx_cnt);
43 canvas_draw_str_aligned(canvas, 116, 24, AlignRight, AlignBottom, temp_str);
44 } else {
45 canvas_set_font(canvas, FontSecondary);
46 canvas_draw_str_aligned(canvas, 127, 24, AlignRight, AlignBottom, "KiB.");
47 canvas_set_font(canvas, FontKeyboard);
48 snprintf(temp_str, 18, "%lu", model->tx_cnt / 1024);
49 canvas_draw_str_aligned(canvas, 111, 24, AlignRight, AlignBottom, temp_str);
50 }
51
52 if(model->rx_cnt < 100000000) {
53 canvas_set_font(canvas, FontSecondary);
54 canvas_draw_str_aligned(canvas, 127, 41, AlignRight, AlignBottom, "B.");
55 canvas_set_font(canvas, FontKeyboard);
56 snprintf(temp_str, 18, "%lu", model->rx_cnt);
57 canvas_draw_str_aligned(canvas, 116, 41, AlignRight, AlignBottom, temp_str);
58 } else {
59 canvas_set_font(canvas, FontSecondary);
60 canvas_draw_str_aligned(canvas, 127, 41, AlignRight, AlignBottom, "KiB.");
61 canvas_set_font(canvas, FontKeyboard);
62 snprintf(temp_str, 18, "%lu", model->rx_cnt / 1024);
63 canvas_draw_str_aligned(canvas, 111, 41, AlignRight, AlignBottom, temp_str);
64 }
65
66 /*if(model->tx_active)
67 canvas_draw_icon(canvas, 48, 14, &I_ArrowUpFilled_14x15);
68 else
69 canvas_draw_icon(canvas, 48, 14, &I_ArrowUpEmpty_14x15);
70
71 if(model->rx_active)
72 canvas_draw_icon_ex(canvas, 48, 34, &I_ArrowUpFilled_14x15, IconRotation180);
73 else
74 canvas_draw_icon_ex(canvas, 48, 34, &I_ArrowUpEmpty_14x15, IconRotation180);*/
75}

80static bool usb_can_input_callback(InputEvent* event, void* context) {
81 furi_assert(context);
82 usbCanView* usb_can_view = (usbCanView*)context;
83 bool consumed = false;
84
85 if(event->type == InputTypeShort) {
86 if(event->key == InputKeyLeft) {
87 consumed = true;
88 furi_assert(usb_can_view->callback);
89 usb_can_view->callback(UsbCanCustomEventConfig, usb_can_view->context);
90 }
91 }
92
93 return consumed;
94}
95
106usbCanView* usb_can_view_alloc() {
107 usbCanView* usb_can_view = (usbCanView*)malloc(sizeof(usbCanView));
108
109 usb_can_view->view = view_alloc();
110 view_allocate_model(usb_can_view->view, ViewModelTypeLocking, sizeof(UsbCanModel));
111 view_set_context(usb_can_view->view, usb_can_view);
112 view_set_draw_callback(usb_can_view->view, usb_can_draw_callback);
113 view_set_input_callback(usb_can_view->view, usb_can_input_callback);
114
115 return usb_can_view;
116}
117
121void usb_can_view_free(usbCanView* usb_can_view) {
122 furi_assert(usb_can_view);
123 view_free(usb_can_view->view);
124 free(usb_can_view);
125}
126
128View* usb_can_get_view(usbCanView* usb_can_view) {
129 furi_assert(usb_can_view);
130 return usb_can_view->view;
131}
132
134void usb_can_view_set_callback(usbCanView* usb_can, usbCanViewCallBack_t callback, void* context) {
135 furi_assert(usb_can);
136 furi_assert(callback);
137
138 with_view_model_cpp(
139 usb_can->view,
140 UsbCanModel*,
141 model,
142 {
143 UNUSED(model);
144 usb_can->callback = callback;
145 usb_can->context = context;
146 },
147 false);
148}
149
156void usb_can_view_update_state(usbCanView* instance, UsbCanConfig* cfg, UsbCanStatus* st) {
157 furi_assert(instance);
158 furi_assert(cfg);
159 furi_assert(st);
160
161 with_view_model_cpp(
162 instance->view,
163 UsbCanModel*,
164 model,
165 {
166 model->vcp_port = cfg->vcp_ch;
167 model->tx_active = (model->tx_cnt != st->tx_cnt);
168 model->rx_active = (model->rx_cnt != st->rx_cnt);
169 model->tx_cnt = st->tx_cnt;
170 model->rx_cnt = st->rx_cnt;
171 },
172 true);
173}
